mobile-frontend-collection-anon-view-lis: Text shown when trying to see your own collections on [[Special:Collections]] but the user is not logged in.
mobile-frontend-collection-watchlist-tit: Title used for special casing the Watchlist collection on the [[Special:Collections]] page.
mobile-frontend-collection-watchlist-des: Default description for special casing the Watchlist collection on the [[Special:Collections]] page.
mobile-frontend-collection-read-more: Label for the read more link used on [[Special:Collections]].
mobile-frontend-collection-private: Label for a collection when it is not publicly visible
mobile-frontend-collection-article-count:
Expression of the number of articles in a collection.
Parameter:
 * $1 - number of articles in the collection
mobile-frontend-collection-empty: Message shown on an empty rendered collection on [[Special:Collections]].
mobile-frontend-collection-empty-footer: Footnote shown on an empty rendered collection on [[Special:Collections]].
